JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking an experienced a Global Access Risk Analyst to join our team. This position will be responsible for understanding and supporting the design of Facebook's organizational, procedural and technological security controls within the context of security risk to our business based on geographic location. The position will also help codify these controls in supporting documentation and explain them to our internal stakeholders. The Global Access Risk Analyst will be someone that has a keen understanding of the global implications of our business, a passion for implementing innovative security controls that mitigate risk to the company, and empower Facebook's culture of rapid innovation. This role requires a mix of business and technical acumen, the ability to inspire and influence decisions pertaining to security standards, a polished ability to communicate with key internal stakeholders, and interest in solving business challenges with geopolitical risks.Serve as the subject matter expert for access management in the context of global locations.Work with overall Access
